page.title: 20Romley Cottage,Hall & Farm.
page.content:
When we went for a walk we went to {Stanfree}with our teachers Mrs Mellor and Mrs Chapman. We walked through a muddy bit of land which horses had been on. We looked at our maps and saw that we were at{Romley Farm.
{ Romley Hall}was in ruins but on our map we saw that there was a foot path leading right up to it. We asked a man if we could go up to the ruins of the Hall which was through the Farm yard, but he said no.
On our walk we also saw a man putting a few cows in a field so they could eat the grass. He had a lovely puppy with him that was black and white.
By LISA PASKIN.
